cast.original_title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
cast.overview: When a huge alien probe enters the galaxy and begins to vaporize Earth's oceans, Kirk and his crew must travel back in time in order to bring back whales and save the planet.
cast.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

details.biography: David Ellenstein is known for primarily voice acting for English dubs of  Akira (1988) and Lupin III: The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) as well as a live action role in Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986). He is currently the Artistic Director at the Laguna Playhouse in Laguna Beach, California.
details.name: David Ellenstein
